Text: FW RE Stuart KauffmanMessage for RosalieOriginal Message From Ann Stagg Sent Monday October AM To Subject RE Stuart Kauffman Dear Rosalie Thank you for taking my call last week I understand that you are planning to check with Mr Lay as to when he might be available to take a telephone call from Stuart Kauffman As I mentioned Stuart and Mr Lay have met on a few occasions and have some common business strategies to discuss The initial call would take just fifteen minutes Please let me know when you can confirm a date and time My phone number is Thanks again Ann Stagg BiosGroup wwwbiosgroupcom
